mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.NAME AS p_name, C.M_ID, C.CONTENT, C.W_DATE, C.CODE, C.C_NO, P.pet_no FROM PET P, MEMBER M, COUNSEL C WHERE P.PET_NO = C.PET_NO AND P.M_ID = M.M_ID AND c.P_ID= #{p_id} AND c.p_no = 0 ORDER BY C_NO ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}+1 AND (#{pageNum})*#{amount}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT P.NAME AS p_name, SUBSTR(C.CONTENT,0,20) AS content, PM.NAME AS pm_name, C.W_DATE, P.pet_no, C.CODE, CO.CONTENT AS co_content, c.p_id, c.m_id, c.c_no FROM COUNSEL C, PET P, P_MEMBER PM, F_CODE CO WHERE C.PET_NO = P.PET_NO AND PM.P_ID = C.P_ID AND C.CODE = CO.CODE AND P.M_ID = #{m_id} AND c.p_no=0 ) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}+1 AND (#{pageNum})*#{amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM COUNSEL WHERE P_ID = #{p_id} AND p_no=0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM counsel WHERE p_id=#{p_id} AND m_id=#{m_id} AND code!=303
SELECT c_no, content, TO_CHAR(w_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS w_date, p_id, pet_no, code, p_no, m_id, sender, r_check FROM counsel WHERE p_no = #{c_no} OR c_no = #{c_no} ORDER BY w_date asc
